-- Get permission
... to access ODC002
Pushbutton handling
Open transaction (if user has enough rights)
Debtor client data
Note for changes in DEBC_CLIENTDUNNINGCODE (only NL)
I= Initialisation
O= Online
''= Change tab
Ask confirmation to save changes
Save changes
V= Validation
Validation ok / database updates performed -> go back online
... else gp back to online-screen (in modify mode)
C= Cancel
A. Record has not been changed ... just exit
B. record has been changed ...
Init. value for answer
Ask for confirmation
Cancel answer = 'N'
Cancel answer <> 'N'
T - Concentration
Ask confirmation to save changes
U - Concentration group
Ask confirmation to save changes
//if DEBC_DATDELETED <> null cancel all permissions
-- Select main debtor, display values as tooltip
.. in case of <> NL the normal F5 list on CODE has to be used
@In case of GNRL_CODE = NL --> DEBC_CLIENTDUNNINGCODE is used for special
debtor code, in this case some DCRM fields have to be displayed as tooltip
Tooltip for BANK_ID
description for incasso type
description for incasso condition
Check if there is any contactperson defined ...
Set Mode
--- Incassotype is changed from or to 4
... incasso type = 4 (SEPA)
... incasso type = 4 (SEPA)

Max. finance days after inv date
Nr days before verif by phone

ExpSyntax.val: ViewMod (0) AND Level (0)='RM' AND NOT ({0,2}) OR {3,2} AND NOT ({0,2})
NOT (GetParam ('ERROR')) OR GetParam ('ERROR') AND GetParam ('ERROR_NR')=0 AND SetParam ('ERROR','FALSE'LOG)
NOT (GetParam ('ERROR')) OR GetParam ('ERROR') AND GetParam ('ERROR_NR')=1 AND SetParam ('ERROR','FALSE'LOG)
NOT (GetParam ('ERROR')) OR GetParam ('ERROR') AND GetParam ('ERROR_NR')=2 AND SetParam ('ERROR','FALSE'LOG)
NOT (GetParam ('ERROR')) OR GetParam ('ERROR') AND GetParam ('ERROR_NR')=3 AND SetParam ('ERROR','FALSE'LOG)

NOT (GetParam ('ERROR')) OR GetParam ('ERROR') AND GetParam ('ERROR_NR')=16 AND SetParam ('ERROR','FALSE'LOG)
NOT (GetParam ('ERROR')) OR GetParam ('ERROR') AND GetParam ('ERROR_NR')=5 AND SetParam ('ERROR','FALSE'LOG)
NOT (GetParam ('ERROR')) OR GetParam ('ERROR') AND GetParam ('ERROR_NR')=8 AND SetParam ('ERROR','FALSE'LOG)

Text.val: C= Cancel
V= Validation
N= New contactperson
M= Modify contactperson
D= Delete contactperson
I= Initialisation
T=Call concentration
U=Call Concentration group
Range on DEBH
Client info
Ask for confirmation
@ Uses alpha 10000 field to avoid problems with copy/paste from e. g. MS Word
because if using an RFT control also the formating is stored to DCRM_NOTICE
If DCRM_NOTICE is used for output (e.g. BXA425) the formating triggers are
written to XML. Magic only ignores this formating parts if the blob field is
used in online programs
... enable OK button on attributes 2 tab in case of changes (changes in remarks
are directly stored)
-- Button OK
... if only remarks are changed, stored changes directly to DB
-- Button Cancel
-- Exit without saving
-- Exit with saving
... if only remarks are changed, stored changes directly to DB

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans ('SCR[ODC002]: Reason of debtor type changes')
